name: Michael Snow
caption: Michael Snow, 2007
works: New York Eye and Ear Control
summary: Michael Snow,  (born December 10, 1929) is a Canadian artist working in painting, sculpture, video, films, photography, holography, drawing, books and music. His best-known films are Wavelength (1967) and La Région Centrale (1971), with the former regarded as a milestone in avant-garde cinema.
